name: Agony VR
description:
A JOURNEY THROUGH HELL!


Explore the most terrifying vision of Hell in the history of gaming in new, more immersive edition!

With virtual reality, Agony becomes even more brutal and scary.

Kill everyone who will stand in your way, and find the Red Goddess, in fully uncensored, Agony.

Are you ready for a level of fear, you have never known before?

WELCOME TO HELL


Agony will put you in the middle of hellish chaos, in which your sacrifice will often be put to the test. With no memories about your past, your main goal will be to stay alive.

Be a witness to the brutal scenes of murder and become a judge and an executioner of the condemned souls!

Avoid the traps and develop your character's skills to discover the secret of your past and the path to salvation.

FACE YOUR FEARS


Take on a role of brutal predator, leaving behind a bloody path littered with the limbs of your victims!

During your bloody journey, by interacting with imprisoned souls you will get to know, that the only way out of this place requires a meeting with the mystical Red Goddess - architect of this place of sorrow and pain, and the sole entity with knowledge of how to escape. Be aware, her attractiveness and sex appeal will often make you hesitate.

The road will be one of the most difficult in your life, full of dark tunnels, strange creatures and bloody sights.

RELEASE NOTE


The decision not to include the teleport mode in the full version was intentional.

This is a dark, stealth game, where the player has to feel the ambiance and make the effort to walk from the start to the end.

In the developer's view the teleport would ruin the most valuable feature of the game which is the full immersion in the hellish plot.



Do you really think you've seen everything?
Enter the brutal world of Agony VR and your sense of fear will never be the same again.
